verses.verse: (A Song; a Psalm of the sons of Korah.) <S%H1419>Great<s%> is the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H3966>greatly<s%> to be <S%H1984>praised,<s%> In the <S%H5892>city<s%> of our <S%H430>God,<s%> His <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>

<S%H3303>Beautiful<s%> in <S%H5131>elevation,<s%> the <S%H4885>joy<s%> of the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth,<s%> Is <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> [in] the <S%H3411>far<s%> <S%H6828>north,<s%> The <S%H7151>city<s%> of the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4428>King.<s%>
<S%H430>God,<s%> in her <S%H759>palaces,<s%> Has made Himself <S%H3045>known<s%> as a <S%H4869>stronghold.<s%>
They <S%H7200>saw<s%> [it], <S%H3651>then<s%> they were <S%H8539>amazed;<s%> They were <S%H926>terrified,<s%> they <S%H2648>fled<s%> in <S%H2648>alarm.<s%>
<S%H9564>Panic<s%> <S%H270>seized<s%> them <S%H8033>there,<s%> <S%H2427>Anguish,<s%> as of a woman in <S%H3205>childbirth.<s%>
With the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> Thou dost <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H591>ships<s%> of <S%H8659>Tarshish.<s%>

As we have <S%H8085>heard,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> have we <S%H7200>seen<s%> In the <S%H5892>city<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of our <S%H430>God;<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H3559>establish<s%> her <S%H5704>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
We have <S%H1819>thought<s%> on Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> In the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of Thy <S%H1964>temple.<s%>

As is Thy <S%H8034>name,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H3651>So<s%> is Thy <S%H8416>praise<s%> to the <S%H7099>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> Thy <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness.<s%>
Let <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> be <S%H8055>glad,<s%> Let the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H1523>rejoice,<s%> <S%H4616>Because<s%> of Thy <S%H4941>judgments.<s%>

<S%H7896>Consider<s%> <S%H3820><s%> her <S%H2426>ramparts;<s%> <S%H6448>Go<s%> <S%H6448>through<s%> her <S%H759>palaces;<s%> That you may <S%H5608>tell<s%> [it] to the <S%H314>next<s%> <S%H1755>generation.<s%>
For <S%H2088>such<s%> is <S%H430>God,<s%> Our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever;<s%> He will <S%H5090>guide<s%> us <S%H5921>until<s%> <S%H4192>death.<s%>
